Reference

Plotting Functions

data_plot()

Prepare objects for plotting or plot objects

plot(<see_bayesfactor_models>)

Plot method for Bayes Factors for model comparison

plot(<see_bayesfactor_parameters>)

Plot method for Bayes Factors for a single parameter

plot(<see_equivalence_test_effectsize>) plot(<see_equivalence_test>) plot(<see_equivalence_test_lm>)

Plot method for (conditional) equivalence testing

plot(<see_estimate_density>)

Plot method for density estimation of posterior samples

plot(<see_hdi>)

Plot method for uncertainty or credible intervals

plot(<see_p_direction>)

Plot method for probability of direction

plot(<see_p_significance>)

Plot method for practical significance

plot(<see_si>)

Plot method for support intervals

plot(<see_easycormatrix>)

Plot method for correlation matrices

plot(<see_easycorrelation>)

Plot method for Gaussian Graphical Models

plot(<see_effectsize_table>)

Plot method for effect size tables

plot(<see_estimate_contrasts>)

Plot method for estimating contrasts

plot(<see_cluster_analysis>)

Plot method for computing cluster analysis

plot(<see_parameters_distribution>)

Plot method for describing distributions of vectors

plot(<see_compare_parameters>)

Plot method for comparison of model parameters

plot(<see_parameters_model>) plot(<see_parameters_sem>)

Plot method for model parameters

plot(<see_parameters_pca>)

Plot method for principal component analysis

plot(<see_parameters_brms_meta>)

Plot method for Model Parameters from Bayesian Meta-Analysis

plot(<see_n_factors>)

Plot method for numbers of clusters to extract or factors to retain

plot(<see_parameters_simulate>)

Plot method for simulated model parameters

plot(<see_check_collinearity>)

Plot method for multicollinearity checks

plot(<see_check_heteroscedasticity>)

Plot method for (non-)constant error variance checks

plot(<see_check_homogeneity>)

Plot method for homogeneity of variances checks

plot(<see_check_normality>)

Plot method for check model for (non-)normality of residuals

plot(<see_check_outliers>)

Plot method for checking outliers

plot(<see_compare_performance>)

Plot method for comparing model performances

plot(<see_performance_roc>)

Plot method for ROC curves

print(<see_performance_pp_check>) plot(<see_performance_pp_check>)

Plot method for posterior predictive checks

plot(<see_check_distribution>)

Plot method for classifying the distribution of a model-family

plot(<see_point_estimate>)

Plot method for point estimates of posterior samples

plot(<see_rope>)

Plot method for Region of Practical Equivalence

plots()

Multiple plots side by side

Geoms

geom_point2() geom_jitter2() geom_pointrange2() geom_count2() geom_count_borderless() geom_point_borderless() geom_jitter_borderless() geom_pointrange_borderless()

Better looking points

geom_poolpoint() geom_pooljitter()

Pool ball points

geom_violindot()

Half-violin Half-dot plot

geom_violinhalf()

Half-violin plot

Scales

scale_color_bluebrown() scale_color_bluebrown_d() scale_color_bluebrown_c() scale_colour_bluebrown() scale_colour_bluebrown_c() scale_colour_bluebrown_d() scale_fill_bluebrown() scale_fill_bluebrown_d() scale_fill_bluebrown_c()

Blue-brown color palette

scale_color_flat() scale_color_flat_d() scale_color_flat_c() scale_colour_flat() scale_colour_flat_c() scale_colour_flat_d() scale_fill_flat() scale_fill_flat_d() scale_fill_flat_c()

Flat UI color palette

scale_color_material() scale_color_material_d() scale_color_material_c() scale_colour_material() scale_colour_material_c() scale_colour_material_d() scale_fill_material() scale_fill_material_d() scale_fill_material_c()

Material design color palette

scale_color_metro() scale_color_metro_d() scale_color_metro_c() scale_colour_metro() scale_colour_metro_c() scale_colour_metro_d() scale_fill_metro() scale_fill_metro_d() scale_fill_metro_c()

Metro color palette

scale_color_pizza() scale_color_pizza_d() scale_color_pizza_c() scale_colour_pizza() scale_colour_pizza_c() scale_colour_pizza_d() scale_fill_pizza() scale_fill_pizza_d() scale_fill_pizza_c()

Pizza color palette

scale_color_see() scale_color_see_d() scale_color_see_c() scale_colour_see() scale_colour_see_c() scale_colour_see_d() scale_fill_see() scale_fill_see_d() scale_fill_see_c()

See color palette

scale_color_social() scale_color_social_d() scale_color_social_c() scale_colour_social() scale_colour_social_c() scale_colour_social_d() scale_fill_social() scale_fill_social_d() scale_fill_social_c()

Social color palette

Themes

Abyss theme

theme_blackboard()

Blackboard dark theme

theme_lucid()

Lucid theme

theme_modern()

The easystats' minimal theme

theme_radar() theme_radar_dark()

Themes for radar plots

Extract pizza colors as hex codes

Extract Social colors as hex codes
